input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration entry defined in a configuration module.
Example: BCAN
String Value - A description of the change
String Value - A detailed description of the change

String Value - Scheduled start date (epoch)
Example: 1262307600

String Value - bcan user name
Example: adapteruser

String Value - Change Timing
Example: No Impact

String Value - Change Type
Example: Change

String Value - Risk Level
Example: Risk Level 1

String value - Template Name
Example: Install Software Application

String Value - Change Status
Example: Draft

String Value - Latent start time (epoch)
Example: 1262307600

String Value - Latent end time (epoch)
Example: 1262307600

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The change concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 0-success,1-failure
String Value â€“ A verbose message indicating the success or failure of the process

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${template name}') = '0'">${default template name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${template name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.)=0">${user name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${change description}') = '0'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${change default description}</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change description}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${change status}') = '0'">${default change status}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change status}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${impact}') = '0'">${default impact}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${impact}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${urgency}') = '0'">${default urgency}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${urgency}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${risk level}') = '0'">${default risk level}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${risk level}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${change timing}') = '0'">${default change timing}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change timing}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="string(number('${start date}')+500)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${change type}') = '0'">${default change type}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change type}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Change Enumerated Values to Target Values
:Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Change Target Field Values to Enumerated Values

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to retrieve Login Data for user name: ", .)

documentation.description: This workflow creates a change record.
